extendedIngredients.name: lemon
extendedIngredients.originalString: 25g lemon shortbreads or crunchy lemon flavoured biscuits, plus extra to serve, if you like

recipes.title: Little iced lemon mousses
recipes.instructions: Put two-thirds of the lemon curd intoa large bowl with the zest and cream,then beat with an electric whisk until itjust holds its shape. Dribble over the restof the lemon curd and divide between6 small glass pots or glasses, marblingthe curd through as you go. Sit the potson a small tray, cover the whole lot withcling film and freeze for 30-40 minutes.Put the biscuits in a strong plastic bagand bash with the end of a rolling pin tocrumbs. When you’re ready for pudding,remove the pots from the freezer (theyshould be ice cold but still soft andcreamy), top with crumbs and serve.

steps.step: Put two-thirds of the lemon curd intoa large bowl with the zest and cream,then beat with an electric whisk until itjust holds its shape. Dribble over the restof the lemon curd and divide between6 small glass pots or glasses, marblingthe curd through as you go. Sit the potson a small tray, cover the whole lot withcling film and freeze for 30-40 minutes.

Put the biscuits in a strong plastic bagand bash with the end of a rolling pin tocrumbs. When you’re ready for pudding,remove the pots from the freezer (theyshould be ice cold but still soft andcreamy), top with crumbs and serve.
